name: 1688验证商家聊天页面
description: 逐一打开提取的商家聊天页面进行验证

nodes.name: 验证第1个商家聊天页面
等待第1个聊天页面加载
验证第1个商家聊天页面

config.script: console.log('🔍 验证第1个商家聊天页面...'); const currentUrl = window.location.href; const pageTitle = document.title; const isInChat = currentUrl.includes('air.1688.com') || currentUrl.includes('def_cbu_web_im'); console.log(`当前URL: ${currentUrl}`); console.log(`页面标题: ${pageTitle}`); console.log(`是否在聊天页面: ${isInChat}`); const chatInterface = document.querySelector('textarea, input[type="text"], [contenteditable], .chat-input, .message-input'); const sendButton = document.querySelector('button[type="submit"], [class*="send"], [class*="send-btn"]'); console.log(`找到聊天输入框: ${!!chatInterface}`); console.log(`找到发送按钮: ${!!sendButton}`); const merchantInfo = { currentUrl: currentUrl, pageTitle: pageTitle, isInChat: isInChat, hasChatInterface: !!chatInterface, hasSendButton: !!sendButton, merchantName: 'tingyu非凡', merchantIndex: 1, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() }; return { success: isInChat, verification: merchantInfo, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() };

nodes.name: 验证第2个商家聊天页面
等待第2个聊天页面加载
验证第2个商家聊天页面

config.script: console.log('🔍 验证第2个商家聊天页面...'); const currentUrl = window.location.href; const pageTitle = document.title; const isInChat = currentUrl.includes('air.1688.com') || currentUrl.includes('def_cbu_web_im'); console.log(`当前URL: ${currentUrl}`); console.log(`页面标题: ${pageTitle}`); console.log(`是否在聊天页面: ${isInChat}`); const chatInterface = document.querySelector('textarea, input[type="text"], [contenteditable], .chat-input, .message-input'); const sendButton = document.querySelector('button[type="submit"], [class*="send"], [class*="send-btn"]'); console.log(`找到聊天输入框: ${!!chatInterface}`); console.log(`找到发送按钮: ${!!sendButton}`); const merchantInfo = { currentUrl: currentUrl, pageTitle: pageTitle, isInChat: isInChat, hasChatInterface: !!chatInterface, hasSendButton: !!sendButton, merchantName: '平南坤安制衣厂', merchantIndex: 2, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() }; return { success: isInChat, verification: merchantInfo, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() };
